mapper.insert: insert into personnel_management.staff (StaffId, StaffName, StaffAge, StaffSex, StaffPolitical, StaffPosition, StaffDepartment, StaffAddress, HireDate, WorkingYears) values (#{StaffId}, #{StaffName}, #{StaffAge}, #{StaffSex}, #{StaffPolitical}, #{StaffPosition}, #{StaffDepartment}, #{StaffAddress}, #{HireDate}, #{WorkingYears});
mapper.update: update personnel_management.staff set StaffName = #{StaffName}, StaffAge = #{StaffAge}, StaffSex = #{StaffSex}, StaffPolitical = #{StaffPolitical}, StaffPosition = #{StaffPosition}, StaffDepartment= #{StaffDepartment}, StaffAddress = #{StaffAddress}, HireDate = #{HireDate}, WorkingYears = #{WorkingYears} where StaffId = #{StaffId}
mapper.select:
select * from personnel_management.staff order by StaffId desc
limit #{start},#{count}
